name: MorseShooter
description:
Defeat the incoming enemies in order to protect the precious cube by completing the Morse code written on them. 

In MoresShooter large waves of enemies are moving towards  you with Morse Code on them in endless levels getting harder and faster as you try to decode their Morse codes. Failing to complete a sequence of Morse code resets the attack making you re-do the Morse code on the enemy.
